item.title: Over 30 million homeowners don’t have a mortgage right now. Here’s why that’s a big warning sign about the housing market
item.description: Homeowners also aren’t borrowing against their homes because interest rates are too high.

item.title: In Trumpworld, the stock markets say that tomorrow never comes
item.description: Thus the markets remain buoyant despite the apparent dangers.

item.title: Jamie Dimon says Trump was ‘right to chicken out’ on tariffs, but that markets are getting too complacent
item.description: Jamie Dimon warns markets are growing complacent on Trump’s tariff threats, as UBS's Paul Donovan flags a paradox fueling investor overconfidence.

item.title: The CEO of startup Rilla gives his employees up to $1,500 a month to live closer to the office—But there’s a catch
item.description: This startup founder is willing to help workers pay for housing if they’re willing to work 70 hours per week in person.

item.title: Strategizing with AI: How leaders can upgrade strategic planning with multi-agent platforms
item.description: GenAI platforms can help organizations acclimate to an environment of higher-frequency change and adaptation.
